function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of linear mixed effects model may not accurately represent the complexity of disease transmission","Impact":"Inaccurate predictions and ineffective interventions","Mitigation":"Incorporate additional data and consider alternative modeling techniques","Technologies":"Advanced statistical modeling, machine learning algorithms","People":"Public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Data scientists, epidemiologists"},{"Description":"Failure to account for all influencing factors in the epidemic model","Impact":"Inaccurate predictions and ineffective interventions","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive data analysis and consider additional variables","Technologies":"Data analytics, machine learning algorithms","People":"Public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Data scientists, epidemiologists"},{"Description":"Risk of overfitting due to inclusion of multiple interaction effects","Impact":"Inaccurate predictions and ineffective interventions","Mitigation":"Use regularization techniques, cross-validation, and consider simpler models","Technologies":"Regularized regression, cross-validation techniques","People":"Data scientists, epidemiologists","Owner":"Statisticians"}]}
